about-this-site.body: This site is built with a static site generator I wrote in Go. I write my page content in markdown and the files get converted to html! Over the past few years I've built multiple personal websites, mostly with frameworks. For this site I decided to go without one and build the features I needed myself. So, this site is a work in progress and always will be. I'm having fun with it.

frontMatter.data-description: this site is built with a static site generator i wrote in go.
frontMatter.description: a little note about this website
frontMatter.title: about this site

intro.body:
Hi, my name is Thomas and I like making things. I'll share those things here.

Sound good? okay.

Best,

Thomas
